ci_support_linux_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description: SynthPop generates synthetic populations matching the marginal distributions of household and person attributes from census data. It is a reimplementation of PopGen using the modern scientific Python stack, with a focus on performance and code reusability.
about.summary: Synthetic populations from census data, for urban modeling

about.description: SynthPop generates synthetic populations matching the marginal distributions of household and person attributes from census data. It is a reimplementation of PopGen using the modern scientific Python stack, with a focus on performance and code reusability.
about.summary: Synthetic populations from census data, for urban modeling

name: synthpop
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.1" %}

package:
  name: synthpop
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/s/synthpop/synthpop-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dfbea2123a00801d30bc62e47f6d977a91424022227d2747527564f35c3a5805

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - census >=0.5
    - numexpr >=2.3.1
    - numpy >=1.8.0
    - pandas >=0.15.0
    - scipy >=0.13.3
    - us >=0.8

test:
  imports:
    - synthpop

about:
  home: https://github.com/udst/synthpop
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Synthetic populations from census data, for urban modeling'
  description: |
    SynthPop generates synthetic populations matching the marginal distributions of household and person attributes from census data. It is a reimplementation of PopGen using the modern scientific Python stack, with a focus on performance and code reusability.
  doc_url: https://github.com/udst/synthpop
  dev_url: https://github.com/udst/synthpop

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - smmaurer
